properties.description: NetDocuments is a private enterprise SaaS provider specializing in cloud-based document and email management for large organizations, including law firms; 404 employees, $100M revenue, founded 1998, headquartered in Lehi, Utah, with $30M funding, operating in legal technology, enterprise content management, and cloud collaboration.

#1 trusted intelligent platform where legal professionals do their best work
# *Simply intelligent*
**document management**
Transform the way you work with an intelligent DMS that does more than just organize and secure your documents. Automate routine tasks, streamline workflows, and easily collaborate on documents with AI built into the platform —so you can focus on high-value legal work, deliver faster results, and provide better service to your clients.
[Schedule a demo](/demo-request/)
![](https://embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/381f694d35e07759f94573dadd5a45c9.jpg)
## Helping legal professionals do*their best work*for 25+ years.

## Explore our most popular features
Document Management
![]()
Legal AI Assistant
![]()
Microsoft Teams Integration
![]()
AI App Builder
![]()
Email Management
![]()
Document Bundling
![]()
![](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_icon_dms-5.svg)## Document Management
Get organized using the world’s #1 trusted[cloud-native document management system](https://www.netdocuments.com/solutions/cloud-document-management/)built to help legal professionals do their best work.
* Easily find the documents you need
* Be confident the version you’re working on is the right one
* Manage, share, and collaborate on documents in a centralized, secure space
[Learn more](/solutions/document-knowledge-management/)
![NetDocuments Document Management User Interface, shown on a laptop.](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_document_management_840x633.jpg)
![](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_icon_ai-assistant-3.svg)## Legal AI Assistant
Getting started with generative AI for legal is easier than you think! Instead of digging through documents to find answers, let the NetDocuments Legal AI Assistant do the work for you!
* Ask questions of one or hundreds of documents and get instant reliable answers
* Use pre-built prompts with the click of a button
* Keep your information securely within the DMS
[Learn more](/solutions/legal-ai-assistant/)
![NetDocuments Legal AI Assistant, shown over a magenta gradient.](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_legal_ai_assistant_840x633.jpg)
![](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_icon_teams-2.svg)## Microsoft Teams Integration
NetDocuments seamlessly integrates with Microsoft Teams, allowing you to manage, preview, and collaborate on documents using the tools you’re already familiar with.
* Access the documents you need without leaving Microsoft Teams
* Easily save details from a Teams chat to NetDocuments
* Experience a better way to collaborate
[Learn more](/solutions/microsoft-teams-integration/)
![NetDocuments Microsoft Teams Integration, shown on a laptop.](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_ms_teams_integration_840x633.jpg)
![](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_icon_app-builder-1.svg)## AI App Builder
Automate routine tasks, scale your practice, and see day-one value with the AI App Builder –always keeping your documents within the secure guardrails of the NetDocuments intelligent DMS.
* Create AI apps for your unique workflows
* Use our ready-to-go AI apps for legal use cases
* Access education and demos to ensure you get the most out of generative AI
[Learn more](/solutions/legal-ai-app-builder/)
![An example of a NetDocuments Studio AI App comparing a legal document against a firm's Contract Playbook](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_ai_app_builder_840x633.jpg)
![](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_icon_email-1.svg)## Email Management
Stop sifting through mountains of emails and let NetDocuments help you automatically file email messages by client, matter, topic, and more. * Tame your inbox
* Centralize all related files and discussions
* Find what you need faster
[Learn more](/solutions/email-management/)
![NetDocuments Email Management interface, shown on a laptop.](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_email_management_840x633.jpg)
![](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_icon_bundle-1.svg)## Document Bundling
Say goodbye to tedious hours spent labeling and organizing printed documents for closings, litigation support, and more with better, faster document compilation. * Assemble document sets quickly and accurately
* Reduce your paper footprint
* Work securely without ever leaving your DMS
[Learn more](/solutions/document-bundling/)
![NetDocuments Document Bundling, shown on a laptop.](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/homepage_document_bundling_840x633.jpg)
![Webinar icon](https://www.netdocuments.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/webinar-icon.svg)
on-demand webinar
### **The Hidden Costs of Outdated LegalTech: Understanding the gaps –and how to fix them**

company.name: NetDocuments
company.about:
NetDocuments is enterprise content management in the cloud. Small to large organizations, including many of the Am Law 100 firms, rely on NetDocuments’ modern, secure solution for intelligent and confidential document and email management. With decades of document management experience, NetDocuments continually enhances the application, providing customer firms the most innovative solution for document and email management available in the market today. By eliminating on-premises or hosted system hardware and moving into the security of the cloud, the IT burden is dramatically decreased, reducing the cost and complexity of the DMS.

No other cloud-based document management solution is more secure than NetDocuments. Data security and strict digital asset protection are key differentiators of the service that allow law firms and other industries with strict compliance and security guidelines to confidently store and collaborate on their documents and email. Additionally, our powerful integrations with Microsoft Office allow for smart editing, drafting, searching, and version control. Extranets, secure links, and client portals provide collaboration and security to outside parties who need real time access to their documents.

The pillars of our service include mobility, secure collaboration, disaster recovery, and compliance, and our SaaS (subscription-as-a-service) model requires us to proactively engage with our customers, ensuring we are meeting stringent requirements on a day-to-day basis. This includes managing a robust network for technical support and communities to share knowledge and insight regarding best practices.

evaluations.reasoning: NetDocuments is described as an enterprise content management solution that operates in the cloud, which is the defining characteristic of a SaaS offering. The company’s profile lists it as a Software Development firm that provides cloud‑based document and email management for large organizations, including law firms. This aligns with the Enterprise SaaS industry definition, where software is delivered over the internet to business customers. The profile also categorizes the company under "cloud content collaboration" and "enterprise content management," further confirming its SaaS nature.
